item.title: Comparing Functional Languages
item.description: I wrote this blog post about a year ago but finally got a chance to publish it. How manyÂ ::â€™s does it take to screw in a light-bulb? A carâ€™s worth.Â Iâ€™m currently in a class where we are using Scheme extensively. This has made me very used to the idea of structuring my algorithms using car and cdr for any sort of data manipulation.Â car returns the head of a List while cdr returns the tail of List.
